GSD.description:
drm/sched: Avoid data corruptions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.51 by commit 0687411e2a8858262de2fc4a1d576016fd77292e. For more details please see the references link.
